page.title: 15SANTE FE, LYNE
page.content: My farm is called Santa_fe.We used to have pigs, now we have sheep.We had 28 heifers delivered at our other farm at Chobham and we are hay_making. We have two trailers for moving the hay.One is a 40 footer and one a 30 footer.We have a turbo tractor and it has a loader.I drive it on the farm it has a grabbing machine and it picks up 8 bales at a time. The baler picks up the hay makes it into bales and it puts the string on the bales. We have two horses called Bejay and Whitsun . We ride Bejay but Whitsun bucks people off. We had a steer he was friendly and we used to feed him then we sold him, but he was killed. I wish we had'nt sold him.We have 8 rabbits I look after them and feed them.I like living on the farm.
